name: Fire Game
description:
Fire Game is a game about dodging more and more fires.

It was made in 2 week for final project

There are 4 Different types of fires

If you take too much damage from any of them, GAME OVER!

There are a variety of upgrades to help you survive longer.

These upgrades can be obtained by collecting coins and bitcoins scattered throughout the level.

There is no end game, only your own high score to beat.

Source Code
